text: Ni nganichiwa chipanje chenu namuno wanache wenu kuti ni yaimâ€™bandichisye Kukwetu pa dalaja (ja ku Mbepo), pangawaga jwakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone. Basi wanganyao tachipata malipilo gakonjechesya ligongo lya yawapanganyisye, soni wanganyao mu yumba (yapenani ya ku Mbepo) takawe wantunjelele
